text: The University of Antofagasta () is a university in Antofagasta, Chile. It is one of the universities in the north of Chile. == History == It was founded in 1981 thanks to the fusion of the TUS of Antofagasta and the Regional Headquarter of the University of Chile, it was the point of start of the actual university.Universidad de Antofagasta - Reseña Histórica == Faculties == * Basic Sciences * Health Sciences * Human Sciences & Education * Engineering * Medicine & Odontology * Marine Resources * Law and Social Sciences == References == == Other websites == * University of Antofagasta Antofagasta Category:1981 establishments in Chile Category:Antofagasta
title: University of Antofagasta
